comment:
* This class receives OnFrameMetricsAvailableListener.onFrameMetricsAvailable() callbacks and
 * records frame durations in a FrameMetricsStore instance.

methods.name: public void setIsListenerRecording(boolean isRecording)
methods.comment:
* Toggles recording into FrameMetricsStore. When recording is stopped, reports accumulated
     * metrics.
     * @param isRecording

methods.name: public void onFrameMetricsAvailable(Window window, FrameMetrics frameMetrics, int dropCountSinceLastInvocation)

methodNames: public void onFrameMetricsAvailable(Window window, FrameMetrics frameMetrics, int dropCountSinceLastInvocation)
